description.ro: Exaltarea este o bucurie intensa care apare cand ceva depaseste asteptarile. Este o stare de varf care celebreaza reusita si conexiunea.
description.en: Elation is intense joy that arises when something exceeds expectations. It is a peak state that celebrates achievement and connection.

description.ro: Starea de alerta este o vigilenta placuta — o claritate mentala care te face prezent si receptiv la ceea ce se intampla.
description.en: Alertness is a pleasant vigilance — a mental clarity that makes you present and receptive to what is happening.

description.ro: Entuziasmul este o pasiune activa care te energizeaza si te conecteaza cu scopul tau. Este combustibilul motivatiei intrinsece.
description.en: Enthusiasm is an active passion that energizes you and connects you with your purpose. It is the fuel of intrinsic motivation.

description.ro: Calmul este o stare de echilibru in care nu exista amenintari si corpul se relaxeaza. Este baza siguranta din care poti explora lumea.
description.en: Calm is a state of balance where there are no threats and the body relaxes. It is the safe foundation from which you can explore the world.

description.ro: Relaxarea este o eliberare a tensiunii — corpul si mintea se deschid cand sistemul nervos parasimpatic preia controlul.
description.en: Relaxation is a release of tension — body and mind open when the parasympathetic nervous system takes over.

description.ro: Frica este sistemul tau de alarma — semnaleaza un pericol perceput si te pregateste sa te protejezi. Este o emotie fundamentala de supravietuire.
description.en: Fear is your alarm system — it signals a perceived danger and prepares you to protect yourself. It is a fundamental survival emotion.

description.ro: Contemplarea este o stare de observare calma si deschisa — o privire larga asupra vietii care nu cauta raspunsuri imediate. Este spatiul in care se naste intelegerea profunda si acceptarea.
description.en: Contemplation is a state of calm, open observation — a wide gaze at life that doesn't seek immediate answers. It is the space where deep understanding and acceptance are born.
